title: ARBIMON
description: web-based interface geared toward analyzing autonomous wildlife survey data
dataExploration: listen and review autonomous recordings on GUI interface; create listening playlists
organization: manage recorder deployment (phone app); web uploader that supports many common recorder timestamp formats
acousticFeatureMeasurement: aggregate recordings at different temporal and spatial scales
detectorFeatures: customize template-matching detection tool; supervised and unsupervised available
